nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Lesser Orb of Healing\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"A shard of a Dungeon Blessing,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"capable of being bestowed upon\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"another player for a continuous buff,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"but draining mana.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Orb of Life \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"RIGHT CLICK TEAMMATE\",\"color\":\"yellow\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Heals \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"5%\",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\" of max \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"❤ \",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\"per second.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Ignores ♨ Vitality!\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Mana Drain: \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"50 per second\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"❣ \",\"color\":\"dark_red\"},{\"text\":\"Requires Catacombs Skill 16.\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"EPIC DUNGEON ITEM\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
